name: Eagle Write
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the JimJam

Take control of a Lawyer fighting for a dear friend that is charged of murder, Inspired by my fav game of all time (Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney)

Made by SmallBoss

Music by Rath

Testing by ofo, zombie

(all of them are my friends .. i love them <3)

If you want to see the true ending ( Not a modded ending)

https://thesomeonexd.itch.io/eagle-write
